name: School Girls Dance
summary: School Girls Dance is an original game in which you can feel like a student in a school dance group. The player is invited to play for the characters he knows: the fighting Tsundere and the jealous and charming Yandere are now in a new look - they are now dancing classmates. A distinctive feature of the game School Girls Dance is a lot of interesting levels: a school library, a medical center, and a school class. The excellent musical accompaniment of School Girls Dance is in perfect harmony with many dance styles.
